attributes.action: Nyamekye Taino'Hawk, Demands compensation for Americans(West Indians).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cotton was harvested by Americans(West Indians). About 70% of the U.S Dollor is made of Cotton. The value of the U.S. Dollor is less than 10Cent to print.  For 550years The Americans were never given An investment.  
Today, the West Indian (decendant) pays for Health and Education, with money made from under-paid jobs.  Because parents had nothing in the bank for childrens head start. 
A Decleration was made, "all men are equal".  Which was to be the end of Slavery.  Two Acres of land and one mule, Stolen from Murdered (West Indians), Was given back.  But thousands of stolen acres of America is still in Possession by foreign Britian to present 02/03/07, decendents of British rule still governs America (All the presidents). This is an insult, my fathers was never slaves and Fought to the death, now the devils colonist system  say, "here, you're free"...  
We Fought against oppression and won!
Now I say, the British government must pay up.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
